MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: opennumismat, numismatic, coin, coins, collecting, cataloguing, coin collecting software, numismatic software, coin collecting, coin collection, coin software, free, database
English.Char_Desc_45: A free, open-source coin collecting software
English.Char_Desc_80: A free coin collecting software for organize and manage your own catalogue
English.Char_Desc_250: OpenNumismat is a free, open-source coin collecting software. With OpenNumismat, you will be able to organize and manage coin collection: create an advanced catalogue of your coins, wish and selling lists, view statistics for your collection.
English.Char_Desc_450: OpenNumismat is a free, open-source coin collecting software. With OpenNumismat, you will be able to organize and manage coin collection: create an advanced catalogue of your coins, wish and selling lists, view statistics for your collection.
English.Char_Desc_2000: OpenNumismat is a free, open-source coin collecting software. With OpenNumismat, you will be able to organize and manage coin collection: create an advanced catalogue of your coins, wish and selling lists, view statistics for your collection. Main features: * More than 80 customizable fields to describe the coin * Up to 11 photos coins (insert image from file, clipboard, download from the Web at URL) * The grouping, filters and sorting to facilitate the retrieval of coins in the catalog * Generate and print reports, saving as HTML, PDF, MS Word * Export customized lists as MS Excel, HTML and CSV * Duplication of coins to quickly add a similar coin * Batch edit coins * Built-in image editor * Statistics * Ability to add and customize the lists to display the required data * Does not require additional software to work with a database * Search and import coin, banknote, stamp info from Colnect, an online collectors community * Search and import coin, medal info from ANS collections database * Importing from Excel, Colnect, Numista, CoinManage, Collection Studio 3.65 and Tellico (additional software may be required) * Support languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish, French, Ukranian, Hungarian, Portuguese, Greek, Czech, Italian, Polish, Catalan, Dutch, Bulgarian, Latvian, Swedish, Persian * Cross-platform: Windows, Linux, macOS
